name: The Lab (itch) (Buschey)
description:
THE LAB

In this short retro-style horror game you play as a security guard working at a mysterious laboratory. Your job is to oversee the worksite and keep all the doors closed, but soon you realize that you are not alone.

This game has 3 different endings, can you find them all?

Controls

  • WASD - move
  • f - flashlight
  • rmb - interact / close door / use item
  • e - pick up item
  • backspace - back to menu

If the game does not load properly and you just see stars, just press backspace and start again.

The game was originally called "twelve hour shift", but thanks to some feedback I realized the game was far too long and boring, so I renamed it and shortened it to about a third of its original length. I hope you enjoy it!
